--- title: Data Processing keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Functions to clean, transform, and aggregate the raw pitch-level data to the at-bat level, in addition to engineering some useful features." description: "Functions to clean, transform, and aggregate the raw pitch-level data to the at-bat level, in addition to engineering some useful features." ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Identify all eligible game-pitcher combinations

This largely means filtering out openers

  • As defined by Tom Tango, an opener is an pitcher that starts the game and either
    • records less than or equal to 6 outs
    • faces less than or equal to 9 batters

For games where there was an "opener", I choose to drop the game entirely.

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

postouts[source]

postouts(game_pitcher_df:DataFrame)

Appends a "postouts" column to DataFrame.

  • input:

    • game_pitcher_df: pd.DataFrame, df of pitches thrown by single pitcher in single game, sorted by at_bat_number

  • output:

    • game_pitcher_df: pd.DataFrame, same as input, with the added "postouts" column.
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

outs_per_inning[source]

outs_per_inning(x:Series)

An aggregation function that takes the sum of a one-time step difference in a pd.Series. Intended to be used in a groupby aggregation to calculate the number of outs recorded in an inning.

  • usage:
df.groupby(["inning"]).agg({"postouts": outs_per_inning})

  • input:

    • x: pd.Series

  • output:

    • sum of one time-step differences in x
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

batters_faced[source]

batters_faced(at_bats:Series)

For a series of at bat numbers (presumably, many repeated), this function returns the number of unique at bats.

  • input:

    • at_bats: pd.Series, pitches in an individual

  • output:

    • int, number of at bats
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
# postouts test
test_df = pd.DataFrame({"outs_when_up": [0, 1, 1, 2, 0, 1, 2, 2, 0],
                        "inning":       [1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 2, 2, 2, 3]})
test_df = postouts(test_df)
assert list(test_df["postouts"]) == [1, 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 2, 3, 3]

# outs_per_inning test
x1 = pd.Series([0, 0, 1, 3])
x2 = pd.Series([1, 2, 3])
x3 = pd.Series([0, 2, 3])
assert 3 == outs_per_inning(x1) == outs_per_inning(x2) == outs_per_inning(x3)

# batters faced test
at_bats = pd.Series([1, 1, 1, 2, 2, 3, 3, 3, 3, 4, 4, 5])
assert batters_faced(at_bats) == 5
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
